purpleculture_pinyin:
zhù
to register; to annotate; note; comment
зарегистрироваться; комментировать; Примечание; комментарий
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 注)
Pictophonetic: 主 indicates the sound; 言 (speech) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
注意 [ zhù yì ]: to take note of; to pay attention to
注重 [ zhù zhòng ]: to pay attention to; to emphasize
註冊 [ zhù cè ]: to register; to enroll
注入 [ zhù rù ]: to pour into; to empty into

    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
    • 主 [ zhǔ ] to own; to host; master; host; lord
heisig_chinese_memo: A study Bible has many annotateions under the words of the Lord.

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A study Bible has many annotateions under the words of the Lord.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " speak " to " main " sound. " Note " is the last word, same as " Note ", which means record and registration. Such as "Hou Han Shu. "Law Lizhi": "The history of the emperor lasts for a long time, cum in the Yellow Emperor, the Ban Shi article, the remarks of the Li Ji, the image should be famous, always verify each other, and the accuracy of tracing the yuan, is the Li calendar." "Ming History. "Criminal Law Chronicles": "Hongwu was determined in the twenty-sixth year, who should be the army, Dali Temple, the Shaanxi Department was issued, the headquarters set up a document book, the name, the year, the township, according to the north and south, arranged A into two volumes, As soon as you enter the inner palace, you will be responsible for hundreds of households and take them to the army."

" Note " also means a comment. "Jade articles. Yanbu: "Annotation, interpretation of the meaning of the text." Such as "New Tang Book. "Yuan Xing Chong Biography": "Xuan Zong's self-annotated Xiao Jing, Zhao Xing Chong as sparse, standing in the academic official." "Election History": "When the examiner's propositions were so secretive that they did not ask for words, the officials asked the story of Zuntiansheng and Yuanyou, with the title of the first chapter, and then mixed the Nine Classics, "The Language", and "Meng" Annotate the sparse or Zishi text to see the meaning of Zunjing."
humanum_short_description_en: From " speak " to " master " sound. " Note " is the last word, same as " Note ", which means record and registration.
humanum_full_description:
從「言」，「主」聲。「註」是後起字，同「注」，表示記載、登記。如《後漢書．律曆志》：「歷載彌久，暨於黃帝，班示文章，重黎記註，象應著名，始終相驗，準度追元，乃立曆數。」《明史．刑法志》：「洪武二十六年定，應充軍者，大理寺審訖，開付陝西司，本部置立文簿，註姓名、年籍、鄉貫，依南北籍編排甲為二冊，一進內府，一付該管百戶，領去充軍。」

　　「註」又表示注釋。《玉篇．言部》：「註，解文意也。」如《新唐書．元行沖傳》：「玄宗自註孝經，詔行沖為疏，立于學官。」《宋史．選舉志》：「時考官命題多暗僻，失求言之意，臣僚請遵天聖、元祐故事，以經題為第一篇，然後雜出九經、《語》、《孟》內註疏或子史正文，以見尊經之意。」
humanum_short_description: 從「言」，「主」聲。「註」是後起字，同「注」，表示記載、登記。

Pictophonetic: 主 indicates the sound; 言 (speech) conveys the meaning.

    • 主 [ zhǔ ] to own; to host; master; host; lord

注重 [ zhù zhòng ]: to pay attention to; to emphasize
註冊 [ zhù cè ]: to register; to enroll
注入 [ zhù rù ]: to pour into; to empty into

(Simplified: 注)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 主 indicates the sound; 言 (speech) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
    • 主 [ zhǔ ] to own; to host; master; host; lord
①灌進去：注入。注射。大雨如注。
②(精神、力量)集中在一點：注視。注目。注意。
③用文字來解釋詞名：註解。註釋。注音。夾註。
④解釋詞句所用的文字：註疏(註解和解釋註解的文字的合稱)。
⑤記載，登記：註冊。註銷。
⑥賭博時所下金錢財物：下注。賭注。
⑦量詞，多用於款項或交易：一注錢。

注重 [ zhù zhòng ]: to pay attention to; to emphasize
註冊 [ zhù cè ]: to register; to enroll
注入 [ zhù rù ]: to pour into; to empty into

Story: A study Bible has many annotateions under the words of the Lord.

從「 言 」，「 主 」聲。「 註 」是後起字，同「 注 」，表示記載、登記。如《後漢書．律曆志》：「歷載彌久，暨於黃帝，班示文章，重黎記註，象應著名，始終相驗，準度追元，乃立曆數。」《明史．刑法志》：「洪武二十六年定，應充軍者，大理寺審訖，開付陝西司，本部置立文簿，註姓名、年籍、鄉貫，依南北籍編排甲為二冊，一進內府，一付該管百戶，領去充軍。」 「 註 」又表示注釋。《玉篇．言部》：「註，解文意也。」如《新唐書．元行沖傳》：「玄宗自註孝經，詔行沖為疏，立于學官。」《宋史．選舉志》：「時考官命題多暗僻，失求言之意，臣僚請遵天聖、元祐故事，以經題為第一篇，然後雜出九經、《語》、《孟》內註疏或子史正文，以見尊經之意。」
From " speak" to " main" sound. " Note" is the last word, same as " Note", which means record and registration. Such as "Hou Han Shu. "Law Lizhi": "The history of the emperor lasts for a long time, cum in the Yellow Emperor, the Ban Shi article, the remarks of the Li Ji, the image should be famous, always verify each other, and the accuracy of tracing the yuan, is the Li calendar." "Ming History. "Criminal Law Chronicles": "Hongwu was determined in the twenty-sixth year, who should be the army, Dali Temple, the Shaanxi Department was issued, the headquarters set up a document book, the name, the year, the township, according to the north and south, arranged A into two volumes, As soon as you enter the inner palace, you will be responsible for hundreds of households and take them to the army." " Note" also means a comment. "Jade articles. Yanbu: "Annotation, interpretation of the meaning of the text." Such as "New Tang Book. "Yuan Xing Chong Biography": "Xuan Zong's self-annotated Xiao Jing, Zhao Xing Chong as sparse, standing in the academic official." "Election History": "When the examiner's propositions were so secretive that they did not ask for words, the officials asked the story of Zuntiansheng and Yuanyou, with the title of the first chapter, and then mixed the Nine Classics, "The Language", and "Meng" Annotate the sparse or Zishi text to see the meaning of Zunjing."

註字的基本解释

註
zhù
同“注”③註⑤。

註字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhù］
［《廣韻》中句切，去遇，知。］
［《廣韻》之戍切，去遇，章。］
(1)记载。
(2)注解；训释。
(3)注定。
(4)通“注”。灌注，流入。
(5)通“駐”。留待；等待。

註字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　註； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1152第26
【廣韻】之戍切【集韻】【韻會】朱戍切，?音鑄。【玉篇】疏也，解也。【正韻】訓釋也。【毛詩·序疏】註者，著也。言爲之解說，使其義著明也。【儀禮·士冠禮疏】言註者，註義于經下，若水之注物，亦名爲著。【晉書·向秀傳】始秀欲註《莊子》，嵆康曰：此書詎復須註。【舊唐書·?宗紀】上訓註《孝經》，頒于天下。　又【博雅】識也。【通俗文】記物曰註。【穀梁傳·昭十一年】一事註乎志，所以惡楚子也。【後漢·律歷志論】重黎記註。　又【類篇】拏也。【揚子·方言】謰謱，拏也。南楚或謂之支註。　又【廣韻】中句切【集韻】株遇切，?音駐。義同。　又【類篇】述也。　【集韻】或作注。

註字的源字形

註字的起名意思

记载，登记；以文字解释词句；解释词、句使用的文字。

[①]［zhù］
[Sentence cut in "Guangyun", to meet, to know. ]
["Guang Yun" cut and cut, go to meet, chapter. ]
(1) Record.
(2) Annotation; exposition.
(3) Doomed.
(4) Through "Note". Perfusion, inflow.
(5) Through "resident". Stay; wait.
